snippet.title: No sleep ‘til Fairbanks: Following the 1,000-mile Yukon Quest dog sled race
snippet.description:

snippet.title: The Beginner's Guide To College Football Recruiting: A Layperson's Primer
snippet.description:
The Beginner's Guide To College Football Recruiting: A Layperson's Primer by Spencer Hall on Jan 13 2012, 9:45a
What is recruiting? Does it matter? How does it work? Is everyone cheating? With national signing day not even three weeks away, it's time to get some answers. Yes, of course everyone's cheating.

snippet.title: What Happened To Allen Iverson? Looking Back At The Most Bizarre Six Months Of A Great Career
snippet.description:
What Happened To Allen Iverson? Looking Back At The Most Bizarre Six Months Of A Great Career by Andrew Sharp on Mar 2 2010, 1:03p
What can you say at this point? This year, I've defended Allen Iverson's legacy, explained away his shortcomings, and lauded the marriage with the 76ers, and that's just since he left Memphis. But...
